overview: Jessica and Misty are a mother and daughter hooker team. In their desire to entice wealthy clients, they buy a fancy new cathouse. It proves to be a great investment. As can be seen in this day-in-the life tale, it's all fuck, fuck, fuck for the two hot ladies. Dallas and her brother Joe enjoyed a sexual relationship when they were younger. Returning to the house where they grew up, the pair find their passions rekindled with a vengeance. At night Dallas lies naked playing with herself to thoughts of Joe. But she doesn't need to fantasize for long. Into her room comes Joe himself - hard and ready for his sister. Then it is like the good old days - Dallas and her brother fucking up a storm in numerous positions.
title: Taboo Tales 84
